title.rendered: Startup and Corporate Team Building in the Mountains

content.rendered:
Nestled in the serene landscapes of Tirthan Valley near Manali, Ausnya offers the perfect escape for corporate leaders seeking a blend of relaxation and inspiration. With 30 elegantly designed rooms, our boutique hotel provides an intimate setting ideal for hosting transformative leadership retreats.

Why Choose Tirthan Valley for Your Leadership Retreat?

Tirthan Valley is a hidden gem in the Himachal Pradesh region, known for its pristine beauty, tranquil environment, and unspoiled natural surroundings. Far from the hustle and bustle of urban life, this picturesque location allows leaders to disconnect from their daily grind and reconnect with their inner selves and their teams.

Ausnya: The Perfect Venue

Ausnya boasts a range of amenities designed to enhance your retreat experience:

Comfortable Accommodations: Each of our 30 rooms is designed with comfort and elegance in mind, offering stunning views of the valley and modern amenities to ensure a restful stay.

Recreational Activities: From guided nature walks and bird watching to angling and traditional Himachali cultural experiences, we offer a variety of activities to help your team unwind and bond.

Retreat Packages Tailored for Leaders
We offer customizable retreat packages to meet the specific needs of your organization. Whether you’re looking for intensive leadership training sessions or a mix of learning and leisure, we can tailor our services to create a memorable experience for your team.

Sample Itinerary:

Day 1: Arrival and Orientation
Check-in and quick property tour
Orientation session and team introductions
Evening bonfire with local musicians

Day 2: Leadership Workshops
Morning yoga and meditation
Leadership development sessions with professional trainers
Afternoon breakout sessions
Evening nature walk in GHNP

Day 3: Team Building and Recreation
Team-building exercises and challenges
Adventure activities like trekking and rock climbing
Evening cultural program with local folklore

Day 4: Reflection and Departure
Morning feedback session
Leisure time for exploring the valley
Check-out and departure

Why Ausnya Stands Out

Personalized Service: Our dedicated staff is committed to providing personalized service, ensuring that every aspect of your retreat runs smoothly.
Gourmet Cuisine: Enjoy a variety of local dishes prepared by our local cooks, using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.
Sustainable Practices: We are committed to eco-friendly practices, ensuring that your retreat has a minimal environmental impact.

Transform your team’s potential and recharge their spirits with a leadership retreat at Ausnya in Tirthan Valley. Contact us today to learn more about our packages and to book your stay.
